description:
Tama is fascinated by Beh`s stories of looking for secret paths. They begin looking for new secret paths together. THey find an amazing place, but for some reason, Bull is there, too!
One rainy day, a cat named Navi wanders into Nora`s house drenched to the bone. Navi is a housecat from an affluent home on Second Street who is being bullied by a local stray cat, forced to bring him food. Then, Nora challenges to the stray to a contest?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3丁目ラビリンス / ふたりのノラ
The Labyrinth of Third Street / Two Strays
